about_the_game:
Dstroy 2 is a bombermania local multiplayer game. Sequel of Dstroy, our first game release in 1995 on Msdos.

This demo represent the 0.8 version of the game, and is allowing us to get many feedback on what we should still improve, keep or change.
The demo propose you to play to 3 different type of Tournaments, against bots or 2 to 4 players.
- The Roots mode propos you to play to the game without many random bonuses on classic square maps.
- The Classic mode propose you to play to a fun full mode with many fun and random bonuses.
- The Paint mode propose you to paint the maximum amount of floor tiles in less than 1 Minute against other players

A solo or coop Survival mode is proposed too. Your goal there is to reach the higher score possible on local or worldwide leaderboard
Our adventure mode is not available in this demo.

The demo allow you to play locally of course, but Online thru the Steam REMOTE PLAY too.

Thx very much for trying the game.
